name: GmaneReader - ChooseMonoFont
description:
Read postings at the many Web interfaces for gmane.org. NON-AUTO-UPDATE-ABLE version of my GmaneReader UserStyle.
Allows you to choose your preferred monospace (fixed-width) font.
additional_info:
Read postings at the many Web interfaces for gmane.org. Messages font enlarged for the failing vision of older people.
See notes embedded as comments in the CSS source code.
Because the UserStyles infrastructure cannot support auto-update of user-configurable Styles, the user will need to check for updates to get newer versions.
